title: Search hits by look date API
Description: It provides statistics based on the number of searches performed on a certain period. Different aggregation levels are returned depending on the presence of neither, either or both of the origin and destination parameters.

inputs.name: market
inputs.description: 2-letter IATA country code of the point of sale

inputs.name: month
inputs.description: month of look date formatted as YYYY-MM

inputs.name: origin
inputs.description: 3-letter IATA code of the departure city (optional)

inputs.name: destination
inputs.description: 3-letter IATA code of the arrival city (optional)

outputs.name: top_onds
outputs.description: top 50 origin and destination pairs of cities

outputs.name: advance_search
outputs.description: distribution of look dates in weeks prior to departure

outputs.name: duration
outputs.description: distribution of stay durations in days
